name: Ivan's academy of limited directions
description:
It's the first day back to school, when you suddenly discover that you've been taken prisoner in the 1'st dimension. what a pain! 

Armed with only the left and right arrow keys, can you escape the deamons, flying skulls and extremely evil hats and make your way all the way to school (probably not)

Made in PICO-8 in 3 days, my second game prodject.

Enjoy (or not, if you prefer)
